basics.name: Felipe Gomes Miyazato
basics.expertise: Data engineering, analytics and computational physics
basics.summary: Experienced Data Engineer with a background in Physics and a strong passion for building scalable and reliable data infrastructure. Proven expertise in designing and implementing ETL/ELT pipelines, data warehousing solutions, and process automation. Adept at leveraging cloud platforms and big data technologies to transform data into actionable insights. Open to remote work, relocation, and new challenges in a data-driven company.

work.name: BairesDev (Contractor for Pinterest)
work.summary: Contracted by BairesDev to work within Pinterest's internal data engineering team. Designed, built, and maintained data pipelines, ETL processes, and analytical tools. Performed data analysis and BI with Superset dashboards and iPython notebooks. Developed custom data integrations for internal tooling. Leveraged technologies such as Python, SparkSQL, Presto/Trino, Airflow, and Superset.
highlights: Contracted by BairesDev to work within Pinterest's internal data engineering team
Designed, built, and maintained data pipelines for client's internal data engineering team
ETL processes, analytical tool and cross-team collaboration
Data analysis and BI with Superset dashboards and iPython notebooks
ETLs with Airflow for big data with Spark and Presto
Develop custom data integrations for internal tooling
Leverage technologies such as Python, SparkSQL, Presto/Trino and Superset

work.name: GV2C Consulting & Solutions
work.summary: Design and deliver Robotic Process Automation (RPA) solutions for Ambev's internal process automation team. Identify automation opportunities, analyze business requirements, develop and implement bots. Leverage RPA tools like Python (Selenium, SQLalchemy, API integrations...) and ServiceNow (AppEngine, Mid-servers, API integrations...).
highlights: Design and deliver Robotic Process Automation (RPA) solutions for Ambev's internal process automation team
Identify automation opportunities, analyze business requirements, develop and implement bots
Leverage RPA tools like Python (Selenium, SQLalchemy, API integrations...) and ServiceNow (AppEngine, Mid-servers, API integrations...)

work.name: Ali Crédito
work.summary: Data analysis and BI with dashboards and iPython notebooks. Data mining and web scraping for databases and CRM enrichment. Design, development and management of integrations, data pipelines, process automations, ETLs, databases and CRM with Python and SQL in AWS. Technical leadership with team and project management, code review. Development of calculation engines for financial products in micro-services frameworks. Operational support and monitoring.
highlights: Data analysis and BI with dashboards and iPython notebooks
Data mining and web scraping for databases and CRM enrichment
Design, development and management of integrations, data pipelines, process automations, ETLs, databases and CRM with Python and SQL in AWS
Technical leadership with team and project management, code review
Development of calculation engines for financial products in micro-services frameworks
Operational support and monitoring

work.name: GV2C Consulting & Solutions
work.summary: Automation and process optimization consulting for accounting reports automation projects. Development of Python ETLs with cookiecutter. Project planning and management.
highlights: Automation and process optimization consulting for accounting reports automation projects
Development of Python ETLs with cookiecutter
Project planning and management

work.name: Freelance
work.summary: Data mining and database consolidation for scientific research purposes. Project management. Web-scraping with Scrapy and REST API. Parallel data processing with Dask.
highlights: Data mining and database consolidation for scientific research purposes
Project management
Web-scraping with Scrapy and REST API
Parallel data processing with Dask

work.name: Predicta
work.summary: Development of Python ETLs in GCP environment (Big Query, Cloud Functions, and blob storages). Development of data integrations with Google digital marketing platforms.
highlights: Development of Python ETLs in GCP environment (Big Query, Cloud Functions, and blob storages)
Development of data integrations with Google digital marketing platforms

work.name: TEVEC Inteligência Artificial
work.summary: Development and analysis of ML models with scikit-learn. Modeling and analysis of time series for retail sales volume forecasts and supply chain optimization.
highlights: Development and analysis of ML models with scikit-learn
Modeling and analysis of time series for retail sales volume forecasts and supply chain optimization

work.name: Media Portal Soluções
work.summary: Projeto de integração de serviços de redes sociais com serviços AI para implementação de sistema de ranqueamento de conteúdo.
highlights: Projeto de integração de serviços de redes sociais com serviços AI para implementação de sistema de ranqueamento de conteúdo
